item.title: Journal Club 2012-08-15
item.description: I just came back from our Bioinformatic group (a rather loose association of various researchers at UofL interested in and doing bioinformatics) journal club, where we discussed this recent paper: Google Goes Cancer: Improving Outcome Prediction for Cancer Patients by Network-Based Ranking of Marker Genes Besides the catchy title that makes one believe that perhaps Google is getting into cancer research (maybe they are and we donâ€™t know it yet), there were some interesting aspects to this paper.
